title: Augusta County: John Quincy Adams Nadenbousch to Hester J. Nadenbousch, December 19, 1864
summary: Nadenbousch writes his wife and complains of his lonliness without her. He describes a trip with Freddy to Richmond, and discusses business plans. He also describes his domestic life in Staunton.
keywords: African Americans, Family, Home Front, Slavery, Women, American Civil War
